text: Chapiro is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Jacques Chapiro (1887–1972), Jewish Russian-born, French painter. *Liliane Chapiro- Volpert (1902-1982), known as Lilian Constantini, French actress in the 1920s and 1930s. *Mikhail Chapiro (born 1938), Jewish Russian-born, Canadian painter. ==See also== *Shapiro Category:Jewish surnames
title: Chapiro
